"Hey everyone.                                                                                                           
Thanks for downloading the torrent and dealing with my slow internet.                                                   
I'd like to ask you guys for a favor.                                                                                   
If you could please donate, that would be great.                                                                        
All the money will go toward a seedbox which will be used for all the torrents I upload                                 
This way, you guys get releases faster.                                                                                 
This isnt manditory at all. If you can, please do help out.                                                             
Thanks.                                    - Alexisthebest      "


Damn Dude! your a fucking loser, get a goddamn job to get faster internet, dont try and get peers to donate for something you didnt even create, your just a uploader and what are you? 12 years old? EPIC FAIL fag, LOL
